about_the_game:
In this PvP keyboard share space shooter, you and your buddy will engage in thrilling battles on the same keyboard, controlling a vast assortment of spacecraft, ranging from nimble light fighters to massive capital ships. Each vessel comes equipped with unique special abilities and weapon arrays, allowing for a range of play styles and tactics.

As you and your opponent engage in intense combat, you'll need to utilize quick reflexes and strategic decision-making to outmaneuver and outgun each other. The game features a variety of environments, from asteroid fields to deep space and wormholes, each with its own set of hazards and opportunities for tactical advantage.

In addition to the intense PvP keyboard share battles, the game also offers a LAN multiplayer mode, where you can hone your skills as defeat your rivals.

The game's visuals are old school, featuring sprite based spacecraft models and environmental hues that add to the game's already immersive atmosphere.

Overall, this PvP keyboard share space shooter offers a thrilling, action-packed experience that's perfect for players who love intense battles and fast-paced action. With its diverse selection of ships and abilities, deep gameplay mechanics, and classic visuals, this game is sure to be a hit with both casual and hardcore players alike.

name: Alpha MMXXV

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8.1, Widows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: none
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 11

short_description: PvP keyboard share space shooter, you and you buddy's duke it out on the same keyboard with a last assortment of vessels from light fighters up to capital ships, all with unique special abilities and weapon arrays.
